result_list.explanation: Hébé et les nymphes reçoivent Io. This stage direction describes a non-verbal interaction between characters (receiving Io).
result_list.stgdir: Hébé et les nymphes reçoivent Io.

result_list.explanation: Elle reprend le bras de Phanor. This stage direction describes a non-verbal interaction (taking Phanor's arm).

result_list.explanation: En lui serrant affectueusement la main. This stage direction describes a non-verbal interaction (shaking hands affectionately).

result_list.explanation: Maître Godard la presse, encor, du geste, seulement. This stage direction describes a non-verbal interaction (pressing her with a gesture).

result_list.explanation: Il embrasse Fleur-de-Sauge. This stage direction describes a non-verbal interaction (kissing Fleur-de-Sauge).
Il la baise avec peine. This stage direction describes a non-verbal interaction (kissing her with difficulty).
Lui baisant la bouche. This stage direction describes a non-verbal interaction (kissing her mouth).
Retenant Hernani. This stage direction describes a non-verbal interaction (holding back Hernani).
Puis revenant à Oronte. This stage direction describes movement (returning to Oronte).
Il va à elle. This stage direction describes movement (going to her).
